snippet: The N.C.A.A. lifted the Idaho football team’s postseason ban imposed for failing to meet academic standards for the 2009 through 2012 seasons.
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. lifted the Idaho football team’s postseason ban imposed for failing to meet academic standards for the 2009 through 2012 seasons.

headline.main: Postseason Ban Is Lifted at Idaho
headline.print_headline: Postseason Ban Is Lifted at Idaho
